Title: The Eternal Zero
Writer: Takashi Yamazaki (screenplay), Tamio Hayashi (screenplay), Naoki Hyakuta (novel)
Actors: Jun'ichi Okada, Haruma Miura, Mao Inoue, Gaku Hamada
Plot: A young woman and her brother explore the history of their grandfather, who died in the WW2. They start contacting the m'en who flew with him, asking them about who he was.
